formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A LENGTH ERROR in AnchorVars[16] occurs with the following message:

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: We assumed that all atomic expressions were variables, which is only true at depths greater than 1. In reality, at top-level, lifted literals may have numbers in them. To deal with this, we mask out those which are not variables explicitly.
